info.name: Youtube Neon v2
info.description:
A style for those who like neon and gradients in everything using blue and purple. Almost black background and lighter sidebar with text and thumbnails using gradients and transparency effect on search box. The code has been commented in case you want personal changes.
PS: my bst the ever with a handfull of customization is here and work using Stylus: https://userstyles.world/style/5256/youtube-personalization-color-neon-handull-of-options
